title.rendered: Start. Stop. Continue. Leveraging Technology During COVID-19

content.rendered:
This webinar was part of the 2020 Handshake Access Summer Series

Panelists include Ozias Washington—Career Coach at Wheaton College, Leslie Wright—Assistant Director at UNC-Wilmington, Nick Rathbone—Interim Coordinator of Student Employment at Northern Arizona University, and Patrick Zajac—Career Technology & Recruitment Specialist at Illinois Wesleyan University.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: A panel discussion on how to leverage Handshake and other technology during COVID-19.
